entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Kirkland Lake

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
